title: Playing Card Font
content:
hi

Does anyone know of a full font based on the letters AKQJ on standard playing cards?
author: mike_duggan

comments.content: a search for "playing card fonts" provided: [http://typophile.com/node/12974](http://web.archive.org/web/20100711061804/http:/typophile.com/node/12974)

[Numbers](http://web.archive.org/web/20100711061804/http:/typography.com/catalog/numbers/index.html) from Hoefler & Frere-Jones includes the AKQJ but not the full set of letters.

The referenced thread had links that didn't go anywhere.
On a tangent: Piek, recently released by Optimo, is based on the shape of a Spade, and is beautiful.
